Text: please comment! :) does this one have repeated scenes?
Want to know if this is a real BD copy and if it doesn't have repeated scenes

I've only had a quick browse through the video, and I haven't seen a "repeating-scenes" copy, but randomly clicking along the scrubbing bar showed me the film in the order I remember it from when I saw it in theaters.  Audio is AC3.  Video is 720x304 @ 23.98fps.
